name: fiddlehead
description: A React-like library but with hooks only

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run output:watch" "npm run docs:watch:dev" "npm run docs:start" "npm run playground:watch:dev" "npm run playground:start" "npm run bench:watch" "npm run bench:start"
scripts.docs:build: cd docs && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build
scripts.docs:watch: cd docs && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run watch
scripts.docs:build:dev: cd docs && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run build
scripts.docs:watch:dev: cd docs && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run watch
scripts.playground:build: cd playground && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build
scripts.playground:watch: cd playground && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run watch
scripts.playground:build:dev: cd playground && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run build
scripts.playground:watch:dev: cd playground && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run watch
scripts.bench:build: cd bench && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build
scripts.bench:watch: cd bench && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run watch
scripts.bench:build:dev: cd bench && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run build
scripts.bench:watch:dev: cd bench && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run watch

author: CocCoc Ad Platform
